Syntax.js - Tabs

This is a basic example of how to use Syntax.js to highlight code inside multiple DOM elements, that will then be tabbed.

                        var something = true;
        
                        if ( something ) {
                            console.log( "Output is written." ); // Comment
                            
                            /* Multi-line
                            comment */
                        }
